data.name: Grow Flow Demo
data.detailed_description:
Grow Flow is a first person parkour game, where the player can interact with cubes to change their size.
After being created by Anna, an interdimensional goddess, to play the game she has created, the Player must overcome several challenges and learn how to deal with their creator, just like Anna must learn how to better understand the Player.

The Grow Flow demo is subject to future changes. Any feedback is much appreciated!

Grow Flow contains:
  • Over 60 levels, divided between 7 chapters!
  • In-game save system!
  • Fully voice-acted goddess!
  • Hidden and optional mechanics!
  • Beautiful soundtrack!
  • Secrets?

data.short_description: A first person parkour game with art inspired by european avant-gardes. Make your way through over sixty levels with plenty of different mechanics to explore!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
